books.author: by Madeleine Albright with Bill Woodward
books.description: The former secretary of state examines the legacy of fascism in the 20th century and its potential revival.
books.name: FASCISM: A Warning

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Michael Isikoff and David Corn
books.description: Details of the 2016 presidential election, with an emphasis on Russia's possible involvement.
books.name: RUSSIAN ROULETTE

books.author: by Michelle McNamara
books.description: The late true-crime journalist's search for the serial murderer and rapist known as "the Golden State Killer."
books.name: I'LL BE GONE IN THE DARK

books.author: by Hans Rosling with Ola Rosling and Anna Rosling Ronnlund
books.description: A look at our biases and the argument for why the world is in a better state than we might think.
books.name: FACTFULNESS

books.author: by Barbara Ehrenreich
books.description: A look at aging, the ways people try to control the inevitable and strategies for accepting mortality.
books.name: NATURAL CAUSES

books.author: by Jeff Benedict and Armen Keteyian
books.description: A deeper look at the personal and professional triumphs and disasters of the champion golfer.
books.name: TIGER WOODS

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A provocative look into the future by the author of “Sapiens.”
books.name: HOMO DEUS

books.author: by Peter Schweizer
books.description: The author of “Clinton Cash” describes what some politicians might do to enrich themselves while in office.
books.name: SECRET EMPIRES

books.author: by Jerome R. Corsi
books.description: The conservative commentator describes a secret conspiracy to undermine the Trump presidency. From the author of "The Obama Nation."
books.name: KILLING THE DEEP STATE

books.author: by Chrissy Metz
books.description: A star of “This Is Us” describes her journey toward self-acceptance.
books.name: THIS IS ME

books.author: by Michael Wolff
books.description: A journalist offers an inside account of the first year of the Trump White House.
books.name: FIRE AND FURY

books.author: by Stephen Hawking
books.description: The British cosmologist reviews efforts to create a unified theory of the universe; first published in 1988.
books.name: A BRIEF HISTORY OF TIME
